评论详情: We had a great experience with this product.  Shipping was fast and description of product was spot on.

The robe was extremely soft and cozy but smelled horrible out of the bag. I have washed since and it still carries a chemical weird odor. Not sure what else to do that will help. Kinda disappointed I can't get the smell out.
She wears it nightly and still comments on how soft it is. Great deal.
This robe is worth EVERY SINGLE DIME. The softeaf thing you will ever put on. Washes so well and doesn't shed at all. It's my go-to after a shower and while getting ready. Love it!
No fault of the robe it just was way too hot for my wife.  She needed one that was a little thinner material.
Loved the robe but it ran small. Had to return.
Love it, super soft just like the barefoot dreams blankets. I think the robe runs a little small.
Can’t go wrong with the barefoot dream brand! The packaging was perfect and they didn’t squeeze the air out of the robe - they left it fluffy and cozy! Definitely a favorite robe!
The robe is the correct length and it is comfortable!
This robe is so soft ,warm & comfortable  I love it  the length is perfect I don’t have to worry about tripping over it  it’s not heavy or light. If u need a robe buy it u won’t be sorry
This robe is so comfy, perfect size. Feels like I am wrapped in heaven. Wear it every night. Awesome quality. Cute pattern/color. Love this brand.
It is so comfortable and the quality is great! Highly recommend!
This is such good quality. Soft and so comfortable! Not too heavy but not thin. The best money I e spent on Amazon!

评论概述: If I could wear a robe in public…
评论详情: Can’t say enough how amazing this robe is. I’m a robe gal and know this will be the one I live in now. It’s amazing! So so soft, nice a thick, but short so you can wear it in the summer (we keep our house cold) it’s hair amazing. Yes it’s expensive, but if you’re going to wear it everyday, it’s worth the investment!

I was able to successfully return the robe but I was shocked to receive it.  Barefoot Dreams robes are received folded and tied with a logo imprinted ribbon.  I received a robe balled up, without tags and smelled of fabric softener so it had been laundered.  $158 for a used robe?

I was a little uncertain ordering this robe, since it was kind of expensive.  However, after using this for a period of time I am very happy with my purchase! I would definitely recommend this robe if you were looking at it and considering buying it. It is very warm, and I like the shorter length on it. It’s very fuzzy, and I really like the design - it is exactly what I was looking for! Be sure to get yourself one you won’t be upset that you did!
So incredibly soft and the colors are great.  Fits true to size.  Love it!
Great robe. Received as gift. Perfect fit. Softest and most comfortable robe I’ve ever had. Highly recommend.
Warm but not too heavy, super soft and luxurious
I would never take this off if I had the chance. I ordered a medium and needed a small. Def getting another one. Maybe a couple. I love this robe so much.
I was expecting the robe to be a little softer, however it’s still very comfortable. It’s thicker than I expected and a little big, but overall a great robe.

I’m 5’2” and weigh 110 lbs. I thought the small may be too long or be ill fitting. I was wrong! It’s the perfect length for a robe and fits just right. Not  tight and not huge that it makes it uncomfortable to wear because there would be too much fabric. The coloring is the same exact as the blanket. Would make a really nice gift! Highly recommend!
Gf loves it and never takes it off. Fits as expected. Easy to wash.

Not cheap but worth it! I’m 5’9 and 160 pounds, I bought a medium and it fits perfect! I wanted it a bit bigger so I can feel comfy in it. I literally wear it every morning and night! Love the color! Would buy the lighter shade one but cant get myself to spend another 150$!
It’s cozy and warm. Definitely more for fall winter months. Love the cheetah print

评论概述: Cozy and luxury all in one
评论详情: After hearing about barefoot dreams products for months I made the jump and glad I did.  This robe is amazing.  Soft and plush.  It is great for after shower and just lounging.  I love the mid calf length and you don’t get too hot if you are getting ready while wearing it but it’s cozy enough to stay wrapped in it after a bath and watch tv as well.  Also nice right after a shower as it doesn’t make you feel like it’s keeping moisture on your skin or sticky. It continues to dry your skin without being scratchy or feeling like the robe has become soaked.

so WORTH it!! I expect to have many cups of coffee curled up in this robe. The quality if amazing.

This is the softest, warmest, coziest robe ever. And I love the leopard print. Well worth the price
